name: Caught On Camera
description: Dive into Caught on Camera, a chilling simulation where you play as a security guard monitoring surveillance in a world where the paranormal becomes your reality. Your task is to observe and report strange occurrences, differentiating between mere glitches and true otherworldly events. As you flag anomalies for the system to fix, each shift becomes a test of nerve and attention, challenging you to maintain your sanity amidst the unexplainable. Are you ready to confront what lies beyond the screens?
